summary: Internal email correspondence among US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) staff regarding whether to order an expedited transcript for an upcoming hearing in the Epstein case. The discussion indicates coordination about transcript costs and logistics.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing in the Epstein case was scheduled for the day after this email exchange.

keyFacts: Internal US Attorney's Office (SDNY) email discussing logistics for an Epstein case hearing transcript.
The hearing was scheduled for August 27, 2019 (the day after the email).
There was consideration of ordering an expedited transcript, with cost implications for the court reporter.
